document_data.name: Sharpen
document_data.refs2e: {{cite dragon/163/Hedge Wizards|23-24}}{{cite book/Wizard's Spell Compendium Volume Three|807}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sharpen''''' was an uncommon [[spell]] known to hedge wizards and [[artificers]].
document_data.Effects: The spell sharpened and straightened a blade, removing nicks and dents along the edge. It did not provide any additional combat advantage beyond that of regular maintenance.
document_data.Components: The spell called for [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s only.
document_data.History: An enterprising hedge mage had developed the spell.
